description: A demon who uses her hair to fight, she serves as one of Rikuo`s Guardians. After Rikuo got beat at the first seal in Kyoto and went to recover and train she got the Hyakki Yako to keep motivated by asking them if they want to disappoint Rikuo when he got back. She appears to be Kubinashi`s lover, of sorts, having, in the past, offered her life to save his. She is also closest to Kubinashi out of all the Youkai in the series ad is once known as Kino. Her fear is Midaregami.
name: Kejourou
